SEYKM.IS.summary: Seyitler Kimya Sanayi A.S. manufactures and sells medical adhesive and surgical tapes, wound dressings, first aid plasters, and capsicum rheumatism and perforated plasters in Turkey. It also provides injection and wound care products. The company serves government, private hospitals, medical wholesalers, and pharmacies. It also exports its products worldwide. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Turgutlu, Turkey.
